price: ¿Acaso ellos poseen las llaves de la misericordia de tu Señor, el Poderoso, el Dadivoso?
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡوَهَّابِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu raḥmati rabbika al-ʿazīzi al-wahābi
